special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Ram.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1 d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Variant: Panpipes.
descriptions: Gentle Lullaby. The creature falls asleep and is unconscious for 1 minute. The effect ends if the creature takes damage or if someone takes an action to shake the creature awake.
